description:
Shirabyoushi Kuroko, their chance at saving Sena`s life is murdered. While Eiji is at a loss for options, Hiiragi orders him to withdraw to Dazaifu. When Eiji refuses to accept it, Hiiragi corners him. But then DAISY appears, connecting a line to Rin.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Order ! Que ma foi me protège !
Order! Protect Your Beliefs! Big Belief
オーダー! 守れ, 信念! BIG belief
